about_the_game:
Increase the difficulty with the Ultimate Difficulty Released DLC!

Grab this DLC, so you can increase the difficulty to INFERNO!
detailed_description:
Increase the difficulty with the Ultimate Difficulty Released DLC!

Grab this DLC, so you can increase the difficulty to INFERNO!

name: Dragon Star Varnir Ultimate Difficulty Released

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit (DirectX 11 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (DirectX 11 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card

short_description: The Ultimate Difficulty Released allows players to increase the difficulty to INFERNO!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
